Name: select_feature
Description: Decision to include a feature in the next release

Name: select_user_story
Description: Decision to include a user story in the sprint

Name: allocate_project_budget
Description: Allocated budget amount for a project

Name: assign_worker_to_team
Description: Assignment of a worker to a team for the sprint

Name: set_team_size
Description: Configured team size for the sprint

Name: choose_review_attendees
Description: Target number of attendees for the sprint review

Name: set_task_effort
Description: Estimated effort units for a task

Name: choose_scrum_board_wip_limit
Description: WIP limit (max cards in progress) on the Scrum board

Name: accept_blocker_risk_threshold
Description: Acceptable blocker severity threshold for scheduling

Name: set_story_priority
Description: Assigned priority level for a user story
